Process: takes referrals from agencies. A woman may also refer herself, managed by Community Link co-ordinator.

Services: practical and emotional support to women during pregnancy, childbirth and the early weeks of motherhood
Clients: Pregnant women living in Newham or Tower Hamlets who do not have a suitable support network, or have specific needs or healthcare issues
Process: Women can be referred after the 5th month of pregnancy up until the baby is 6 to 12 weeks old. Referral form on website

Clients: New mums who receive support through Birth Companions and other agencies
